find_answers: Find answers to your technical questions and help others.

error.fetchFail: Failed to fetch questions from backend

writingGuide.title: Writing a good question
writingGuide.intro: You're ready to ask a programming-related question, and this form will guide you through the process.
writingGuide.nonProgramLink: Looking to ask a non-programming question? See the topics here.
steps: Summarize your problem in a one-line title.
Describe your problem in more detail.
Describe what you tried and what you expected to happen.
Add tags to help others find your question.
Review your question and submit it.

form.titleHint: e.g., How do I fix this React error?
form.detailsLabel: What are the details of your problem?
form.attemptsLabel: What did you try and what were you expecting?

alerts.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
